participant_1.background:
I work as a stay at home mom, which allows me to spend lots of time with my kids.
My clumsiness often causes me to trip over my own feet, but I always try to laugh it off.
I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery.
I once saw a massive elephant while on a safari in Africa.
I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.

participant_2.background:
I lost my best friend because I was too weird.
my dreams are often bizarre.
I am a zumba enthusiast who is unsure of my parents' approval of my dream to go to Mars.
i hate to workout , but i need to.
I love the feeling of freedom and adventure that comes with riding my bike.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to ride my bike and I am a zumba enthusiast.
That's awesome! I also love to ride my bike, but I'm not too good at zumba.
No worries, I'm not very good at it either! But I love the feeling of freedom and adventure that comes with it.
I know what you mean! It's so much fun to just go for a bike ride and enjoy the fresh air.
Exactly! And it's also a great way to get some exercise.
Yes, it is! I try to go for a bike ride at least once a week.
That's awesome! I try to go for a bike ride as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time.
I know what you mean! It can be tough to fit everything in, but it's worth it when you get to go for a bike ride.
Yes, it is! I love the feeling of being outside and getting some exercise.
Me too! I think it's the best way to start the day.
I agree! It's a great way to get your blood flowing and wake up your brain.
Exactly! I love it when I go for a bike ride and then I'm ready to take on the day.
Me too! It's the perfect way to start the day.
